Thanks to Paulownia (paulownia.livejournal.com) for bringing this to 
my at=
tention. 

This film is better known to fans as SHINSENGUMI: BAND OF ASSASI=
NS or 
just SHINSENGUMI (1969) starring Toshiro Mifune 
(http://www.imdb.co=
m/title/tt0066372/)

http://www.animeigo.com/samurai/shinsengumi.t  
------=
--------------------------------------

For fans who have not seen this fil=
m yet, you may ask "is this worth 
my time?"

Yes and No.

If you want to s=
ee an interesting characterization of Serizawa Kamo 
then yes.

If you don'=
t want to see what has got to be one of the worst 
portrayals of Okita in c=
inema then stay far far away from this film.

But like many Shinsengumi fil=
ms this production has some kitsch, some 
camp and excessive violence.

[fu=
n fact] Serizawa Kamo in this film is played by Rentaro Mikuni who 
is the =
father of Koichi Sato who has played 2 members of the 
Shinsengumi (1) Seri=
zawa Kamo in the NHK "Shinsengumi!" series and 
(2) Saito Hajime in MIBUGIS=
HIDEN
